events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Senior Software Engineer position and will begin reviewing your qualifications promptly.
Your application was categorized under the Engineering department as a candidate for the software developer role based on your submitted resume.
A recruiter has been assigned to your profile to guide you through the next steps of the hiring process for the engineering position.
The initial screening interview was completed successfully, and your skills appear to match well with the requirements of the developer role.
We received your response confirming availability for the upcoming technical interview, and we appreciate your prompt communication.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th at 10:00 AM UTC, where you will meet with our senior engineers for a coding challenge.
